name: The "Akame Ga Kill" Pokemon Showdown Theme
description: Hey, umm this is a skin based off the anime "Akame ga kill", it's a good watch so if you haven't already and have some time to kill go watch that ;D. Anyway back to the point this is a skin based off that anime, with a couple of the characters that are in it, couldn't put all of them, so sorry if the one you love the most isn't in there :[ If you find anything that's broken in the skin, you can contact me on Origin, Origin is a side server, if again you have time to kill I definitely recommend you checking it out.
